resources.string: To allow the In-App Purchase; tap "Approve Transaction", to deny; tap "Decline Transaction".

In order to test OpenIAB transactions and 3rd party applications, you must create an XML file containing all of the IAP Product definitions, name it "mobiroo.xml" and place it on the device at the following location: "/sdcard/mobiroo-store/mobiroo.xml". Once that is complete, you can then begin testing your 3rd party integration of the Mobiroo OpenIAB Library. If you have any questions, comments or concerns; please do not hesitate to contact: devrelations@mobiroo.com
